metadata.name: Fragment #4
metadata.description:
A spaceship, something organic, an abstract work. This piece could be all of these, and more. Most importantly it's a token (pun intended) of your part in a journey bigger than the both of us.

Fragments are a celebration of creativity for creativity's sake, a reminder to step back and remember what made you fall in love with this crazy ride. 

I want you to have good memories when looking at this piece, maybe we share the privilege of a friendship, or someone you care for gave you this piece as a gift. Think of those moments and cherish them as much as I cherish you, whoever you are.
